metadata.title: CVE-2021-44964 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in garbage collector and finalizer of lgc.c in Luainterpreter 5.4.0~5.4.3 allows attackers to perform Sandbox Escape via acrafted script file.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
lua5.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
